sentence: Michael Brown of Stevensville, Byron Center businesswoman Donna Brandenburg, Farmington Hills Pastor Ralph Rebandt, and Grand Haven financial adviser Michael Markey would not be onstage with their competitors.
author: Paul Egan
title: GOP candidate for governor balks at Detroit Chamber debate over COVID-19 requirements

sentence: Mike Brown; businesswomen Donna Brandeburg and Tudor Dixon; businessman Perry Johnson; real estate agent Ryan Kelley; financial advisor Michael Markey; pastor Ralph Rebandt, businessman Kevin Rinke; and chiropractor Garrett Soldano.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Meatgrinder' GOP Gov. primary in Michigan will leave nominee broke, bloodied, and disliked': expert

sentence: Those qualifying for the ballot would be Dixon, a former conservative TV news host who netted the DeVos family endorsement earlier Monday; chiropractor and grass-roots activist Garrett Soldano; wealthy self-funding businessman Kevin Rinke; real estate broker and anti-coronavirus lockdown activist Ryan Kelley; and pastor Ralph Rebandt.
author: DAVID EGGERT
title: Primary problem: Michigan GOP governor candidates short signatures
